DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

Name: Lizardfolk
Description: Lizardfolk are reptilian humanoids that can hold their breath for 15 minutes. They can make a multiattack consisting of two melee attacks with different weapons. Their typical attacks include Bite, Heavy Club, Javelin, and Spiked Shield.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Heavy Club
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Javelin
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Spiked Shield
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

Name: Mage
Description: The mage is a 9th‑level spellcaster (Intelligence 17) with a spell save DC of 14 and a +6 spell attack bonus. It knows a full list of wizard spells from cantrips to 5th‑level cone of cold, and it can also use a dagger in melee or ranged combat.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Dagger
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee or ranged weapon attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

DefaultAttack.Name: Dagger
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee or ranged weapon attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Claws
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Fire Breath
SpecialAttacks.Description: The mephit exhales a 15‑foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

DefaultAttack.Name: Claws
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

Name: Magmin
Description: A Small chaotic‑neutral elemental that constantly burns. When it dies it erupts in a burst of fire and magma (Death Burst). It can set itself ablaze or extinguish its flames as a bonus action (Ignited Illumination). Its melee touch attack ignites its target.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Touch
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a target takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 3 (1d6) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

DefaultAttack.Name: Touch
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a target takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 3 (1d6) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

Name: Mammoth
Description: A massive, towering beast capable of trampling foes with its powerful charge and massive stomp attacks.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Trampling Charge
SpecialAttacks.Description: If the mammoth moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

DefaultAttack.Name: Gore
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage.

Name: Manticore
Description: A large, fearsome manticore with a lion's body, a human face, and a tail of deadly spines.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Claw
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Tail Spike
SpecialAttacks.Description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Name: Marilith
Description: The Marilith is a large fiend with magic resistance, magical weapons and the ability to take a reaction each turn. It can make seven attacks in a round—six longsword attacks and one tail attack—and can teleport up to 120 feet.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Longsword
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Tail
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make tail attacks against other targets.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Teleport
SpecialAttacks.Description: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

DefaultAttack.Name: Longsword
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Name: Mastiff
Description: A medium‑sized mastiff, an unaligned beast with keen hearing and smell.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Keen Hearing and Smell
SpecialAttacks.Description: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Name: Medusa
Description:
When a creature that can see the medusa’s eyes starts its turn within 30 ft. of the medusa, the medusa can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if the medusa isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.
Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can’t see the medusa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the medusa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the medusa sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 ft. of it and in an area of bright light, the medusa is, due to its curse, affected by its own gaze.

DefaultAttack.Name: Snake Hair
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

Name: Merfolk
Description: Merfolk are amphibious humanoid creatures that can breathe air and water. They wield spears that can be used both in melee and at range.

DefaultAttack.Name: Spear
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Claws
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Harpoon
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Name: Mimic
Description: A shape‑changing monstrosity that can disguise itself as an ordinary object. While motionless it looks indistinguishable from a mundane item, adheres to creatures that touch it, and can grapple and attack with a pseudopod or a bite that deals both piercing and acid damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Pseudopod
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

Name: Minotaur
Description: A chaotic‑evil Large monstrosity known for its brutal strength, devastating charge, and reckless fighting style. It wields a greataxe and a gore attack, and can recall any labyrinthine path it has travelled.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Gore
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Charge
SpecialAttacks.Description: If the minotaur moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 ft. away and knocked prone.

DefaultAttack.Name: Greataxe
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

Name: Minotaur Skeleton
Description: If the skeleton moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

DefaultAttack.Name: Greataxe
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

Name: Mule
Description: A sturdy beast of burden. It is considered a Large animal for carrying capacity and has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Beast of Burden
SpecialAttacks.Description: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Sure-Footed
SpecialAttacks.Description: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

DefaultAttack.Name: Hooves
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

Name: Mummy Lord
Description: A powerful undead ruler. It has Magic Resistance, Rejuvenation, can cast cleric spells, and uses a Dreadful Glare and a Rotting Fist in combat. It is vulnerable to fire, immune to necrotic, poison, and non‑magical weapons, and cannot be charmed, exhausted, frightened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Dreadful Glare
SpecialAttacks.Description: Targets one creature within 60 ft.; DC 16 Wisdom save, frightened, and possibly paralyzed.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Magic Resistance
SpecialAttacks.Description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

DefaultAttack.Name: Rotting Fist
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6+4) bludgeoning plus 21 (6d6) necrotic. Target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution save or be cursed with mummy rot.

Name: Nalfeshnee
Description: The nalfeshnee is a large fiend that possesses Magic Resistance (advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects). It can bite, claw, emit a Horror Nimbus, and teleport. It is a hostile creature with formidable physical and mental attributes.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Claw
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Horror Nimbus
SpecialAttacks.Description: The nalfeshnee emits dazzling light; each creature within 15 ft. that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom save or be frightened for 1 minute. The effect can be repeated each turn. Successful save or end of effect grants immunity to Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) piercing damage.

Name: Night Hag
Description: Night Hag is a fiendish Medium creature with innate spellcasting, magic resistance, and a suite of supernatural abilities. She can change shape, become ethereal using a heartstone, and haunt sleeping victims with terrifying nightmares. In hag form she attacks with claws.

DefaultAttack.Name: Claws (Hag Form Only)
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Name: Noble
Description: A member of the aristocracy, well‑educated and charismatic. Typically unarmed, but can wield a rapier when necessary.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Rapier
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8+1) piercing damage.

DefaultAttack.Name: Rapier
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8+1) piercing damage.

DefaultAttack.Name: Pseudopod
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

Name: Octopus
Description: A Small beast that lives underwater. It can hold its breath for 30 minutes, has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while underwater, and can only breathe water. Its natural attacks are its tentacles (melee) and it can release a cloud of ink to obscure the area.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Tentacles
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Ink Cloud
SpecialAttacks.Description: A 5‑foot‑radius cloud of ink surrounds the octopus when it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute; a strong current can disperse it. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

DefaultAttack.Name: Tentacles
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

Name: Ogre
Description: A large, brutish giant.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Greatclub
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Javelin
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

DefaultAttack.Name: Greatclub
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Name: Ogre Zombie
Description: understands Common and Giant but can't speak. Has the special ability Undead Fortitude.

DefaultAttack.Name: Morningstar
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Name: Oni
Description:
The Oni is a lawful evil Large giant that can change shape between a Small or Medium humanoid and its true Large form. It has innate spellcasting (Charisma, DC 13) allowing it to cast darkness and invisibility at will and charm person, cone of cold, gaseous form, and sleep each once per day. Its weapon attacks are magical and it regenerates 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

**Actions**
- **Multiattack**: The oni makes two attacks, either with its claws or its glaive.
- **Claw (Oni Form Only)**: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage.
- **Glaive**: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10+4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10+4) slashing damage in Small or Medium form.
- **Change Shape**: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large giant, or back into its true form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in humanoid form.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Claw
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Glaive
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10+4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10+4) slashing damage in Small or Medium form.

DefaultAttack.Name: Claw
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage.

Name: Orc
Description: Orcs are brutish, aggressive humanoids that favor melee combat.

DefaultAttack.Name: Greataxe
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12+3) slashing damage.

Name: Otyugh
Description: A large, disgusting aberration with a gaping maw and many fleshy tentacles. It can magically transmit simple messages within 120 ft (Limited Telepathy). It makes a multi‑attack of one Bite and two Tentacles. Its Bite can inflict a disease that reduces the target’s hit‑point maximum. Its Tentacles grapple and restrain foes, and it can slam grappled creatures into each other with a Tentacle Slam that deals bludgeoning damage and may stun.

WeaponProperties: DC 15 CON save or disease (poisoned until cured, HP‑max reduction)
SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours the target must repeat the save, reducing its hit‑point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit‑point maximum to 0.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Tentacle
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Tentacle Slam
SpecialAttacks.Description: The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage and be stunned until the end of the otyugh’s next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and isn’t stunned.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Limited Telepathy
SpecialAttacks.Description: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 ft. of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn’t allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

WeaponProperties: DC 15 CON save or disease (poisoned until cured, HP‑max reduction)

DefaultAttack.Name: Talons

Name: Panther
Description: A sleek, predatory feline that relies on its keen smell and stealth. It can pounce on foes, knocking them prone before delivering a bite.

SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.

Name: Phase Spider
Description: Phase Spider is a large, unaligned monstrosity that can shift between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane as a bonus action (Ethereal Jaunt). It can climb any surface without checks (Spider Climb) and ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing (Web Walker). Its primary attack is a deadly bite that deals piercing damage and delivers potent poison.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

Name: Pit Fiend
Description: A large lawful evil fiend. It has 300 HP, AC 19, darkvision, passive perception 14, and languages Infernal and telepathy 120 ft. It possesses Fear Aura, Magic Resistance, Magic Weapons, and Innate Spellcasting.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d6+8) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned the target can’t regain hit points and takes 21 (6d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns.

While poisoned the target can’t regain hit points and takes 21 (6d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns.

Name: Planetar
Description: A powerful celestial being of lawful good alignment. It fights with a magical greatsword that deals both slashing and radiant damage, can heal allies with a touch, and possesses divine awareness and magic resistance. Its natural armor class is 19 and it can move 40 feet per turn.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Greatsword
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6+7) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Healing Touch
SpecialAttacks.Description: The planetar touches another creature. The target regains 30 (6d8+3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. Usable 4 times per day.

DefaultAttack.Name: Greatsword
DefaultAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6+7) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

Name: Plesiosaurus
Description: A large beast that can hold its breath for 1 hour. It attacks with a powerful bite that deals 3d6+4 piercing damage. The creature has a natural armor class of 13, 68 hit points, and can move 20 ft. on land and 40 ft. while swimming.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6+4) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Hold Breath
SpecialAttacks.Description: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

DefaultAttack.Name: Bite

Name: Polar Bear
Description: The Polar Bear is a Large, unaligned beast. It possesses the special ability **Keen Smell**, giving it advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell. In combat it can use a Multiattack action that allows it to make two attacks: one Bite and one Claws.

SpecialAttacks.Name: Bite
SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

SpecialAttacks.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
